Package org.nd4j.linalg.api.buffer

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DataBuffer
    A data buffer is an interface for handling storage and retrieval of data
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseDataBuffer
    Base class for a data buffer handling basic byte operations among other things.
    BufferReaper
    Buffer reaper for handling freeing of resources related to buffers.
    DoubleBuffer
    Double buffer implementation of data buffer
    DoubleDataBufferTest
    Double data buffer tests This tests the double buffer data type Put all buffer related tests here
    FloatBuffer
    Data buffer for floats
    FloatDataBufferTest
    Float data buffer tests This tests the float buffer data type Put all buffer related tests here
    IntBuffer
    Int buffer
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DataBuffer.AllocationMode
    Direct (off heap) and heap allocation Each has their trade offs.
    DataBuffer.Type
